meta.title: Spartanburg County School District One News Article

meta.content: Spartanburg County School Districts Announce Closure In Response To Coronavirus (COVID-19)

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.div: Physical Address: 121 Wheeler Street Campobello, SC 29322 | Phone: (864) 472-2846 | Fax: (864) 472-4118

img.style: font-family: noto sans; width: 31px; vertical-align: middle; padding-right: 10px; padding: 8px; border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);

div.span: Spartanburg County School Districts Announce Closure In Response To Coronavirus (COVID-19)

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: In anticipation of a mandate announcement from Governor McMaster later this afternoon, all Spartanburg County school districts will be closed for students beginning Monday, March 16 through the end of spring break, with a tentative date to resume of April 6, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Faculty and staff members (except those who are sick, already on approved leaves, or who are considered at high-risk for COVID-19 by their healthcare provider) are to report to work on Monday, March 16 for a teacher workday.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Any student or parents needing to pick up their devices, educational materials, backpacks, personal items, and medications may do so between the hours of 7:30am – 3:00pm on Monday, March 16.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Spartanburg County school districts will provide more information and guidance to their employees and families later today and will continue to provide updates throughout the closure period. All updates and information will also be available on district websites.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: Mailing Address: PO Box 218 | Campobello, SC 29322

br.span: Physical Address: 121 Wheeler Street | Campobello, SC 29322
